body.name: Tork White Soft Dinner Napkin, 1/8 Fold 2-ply, 15" x 17, 28 x 100 napkins, NP528PA

climatePledgeFriendly.details: ECOLOGO certified products meet standards that can reduce the environmental impact of one or more stages of the product lifecycle.

features: Forget unprofessional table settings with Tork napkin styling—cutlery rests on the napkin with little or no overhang.
Avoid poor front-of-house presentation—Tork poly wrapping protects dinner napkins in transit and storage.
Save and protect natural resources with dinner napkins made from 100% recycled, 40% post-consumer fibers.
Build your environmental image with Ecologo certified, EPA compliant, certified compostable napkins.
body.description: Tork White Soft Dinner Napkin:Enhance your guests' dining experience with Tork® dinner napkins. With quality look and feel, this embossed, 2-ply white dinner napkin is delivered to you with protective poly wrapping that ensures a perfect front-of-house presentation every time. The Tork exclusive styling allows cutlery to rest on the dinner napkin with little to no overhang.Advantages at a glance:+ Protective poly wrapping+ 100% recycled+ 40% post-consumer fibers+ Ecologo certified+ EPA compliant+ Certified compostable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A global brand Tork is our global brand of professional hygiene solutions for businesses and one of the many brands that make up the Essity umbrella. 90+ markets globally One of the top Global professional hygiene brands How Tork helps you get ready for business When creating the perfect experience for your guests, it's natural to pay close attention to the details. Tork offers a full range of dinner napkins available in a variety of folds, sizes and quality level so you can find the best option for your business. We know you face business challenges each and every day We deliver the products that take care of your professional hygiene needs We save you time, money and effort, so you can stay focused on your business

Tork Foodservice Essentials A Touch of Elegance Tork dinner napkins provide the look and feel of a real cloth napkin without the costs for linen service, laundering or replacement associated with cloth. Better Absorbency Tork Premium napkins is substantially softer and thicker than standard napkins, offering guests a superior experience at mealtime. Improve Hygiene Each napkin is used only once for a clean, disposable solution.

Tork NC7100 LinStyle Dinner Napkin, Flat Pack Tork NC7140P LinStyle Dinner Napkin, 1/4 Fold Tork NP528PA Soft Dinner Napkin, 1/8 Fold Tork NP5240C Soft Dinner Napkin, 1/4 Fold, Leaves Embossed Tork N7141A Dinner Napkin, 1/4 Fold Product Tork LinStyle Dinner Napkin, Flat Pack Tork LinStyle Dinner Napkin, 1/4 Fold Tork Soft Dinner Napkin, 1/8 Fold Tork Soft Dinner Napkin, 1/4 Fold, Leaves Embossed Tork Dinner Napkin, 1/4 Fold Quality Premium Premium Advanced Advanced Universal Color White White White White White Features 1-Ply 1-Ply 2-Ply 2-Ply 1-Ply Size 17.0" Length x 17.0" Width 17.00" Length x 16.25" Width 15" Width x 17" Length 15.0" Width x 16.25" Length 17" Width x 17" Length Case Pack 500 Napkins per Case Case of 6 Packs, 60 per Pack, 360 Napkins Case of 28 Packs, 100 per Pack, 2,800 Napkins Case of 8 Packs, 375 per Pack, 3,000 Napkins Case of 12 Packs, 334 per Pack, 4,008 Napkins

Tork - Hygiene Solutions Tork inspires you to think ahead so you can meet the highest hygiene expectations and optimize your business performance. Hygiene for all: We are dedicated to raising hygiene standards for the majority of users. Tork is committed to developing innovative hygiene solutions that are better for business and the planet. Tork Vision Cleaning uses the power of real-time data to ensure dispensers are stocked. Tork connected dispensers and people counters, monitor supply levels and visitor traffic in your facility so you can target cleaning and refilling, where and when it's needed most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful quality and Value
reviews.reviewText: The 1/8-fold napkins are just perfect. Please note however, that a full case of these is a lot of napkins. Be prepared for the “real estate” commitment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These napkins are of superior quality and 100% recycled!
reviews.reviewText: Soft and elegant dinner napkins, very attractive for any table or occasion. I use these on a daily basis and enjoy the fact that every pack is wrapped in plastic to keep the napkins clean and dry until they are used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item. Very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I used this for everyday dining. Love it and the price is great. Will buy again. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice recycled paper napkins.
reviews.reviewText: These are better than expected... they look nice for recycled.. they fall apart easily and get pilly ...but disintegrate easily. Huge box of them for the $.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great produ t

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Napkins; great price!
reviews.reviewText: These are our absolute favorite dinner napkins. We buy them by the case, all 2,800, at a time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Used to use Bounty for napkins but since that got hard to find/pricey, decided to use napkins. These are good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Description is completely inaccurate
reviews.reviewText: Although these napkins are featured as being white and soft, they are neither. They are grey-looking, rough, thin to the feel and the narrowest, cheapest looking napkins I have ever seen. If the previous reviewers had ever used even the two-ply Smart & Final First Street napkins, they would be sorely disappointed with these Tork so-called napkins. I wish the previous reviewers had been honest with their comments. If I could give these napkins a zero or MINUS five stars, I would. By the way, I am not a complainer and have never reviewed an item before this. Don't waste your money or time anticipating the arrival of a nice product. You will have wasted both!!
